Assuming that there is such a field named 'phone_number' associated with the unique identifier for each person (e.g., an SSN in many real-world databases), here’s how you could retrieve this data along with confidence scoring:

```sql
SELECT i.individual_id, 
       phone_number, 
       100 - ABS(i.phone_number::NUMERIC / (MAX(i.phone_number) OVER ()::NUMERIC)) AS confidence_score
FROM individual i;
```
